alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 18 at 2:17PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Salt Lake...southwestern Morgan and northwestern Summit Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 217 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near East Canyon State Park, or 11 miles south of Morgan, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Coalville, East Canyon State Park, Emigration Canyon, Henefer, Emory, Hoytsville, Echo and Echo Reservoir. This includes the following highways... Interstate 84 between mile markers 114 and 119. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 158 and 178. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Western Uinta Mountains
